metadata.title: AKS Large Data Transfer from Container
metadata.description: Detects unusually large outbound data transfers from containers.

properties.description: Detects unusually large outbound data transfers from AKS pods which may indicate data exfiltration.
properties.query:
let DataTransferThresholdMB = 500;
let TimeWindow = 15m;
// Use NSG Flow Logs if available
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where SubType_s == "FlowLog"
| where FlowDirection_s == "O" // Outbound
| extend
    SourceIP = SrcIP_s,
    DestinationIP = DestIP_s,
    DestinationPort = DestPort_d,
    BytesSent = OutboundBytes_d,
    BytesReceived = InboundBytes_d,
    Protocol = L4Protocol_s
| where BytesSent > 0
| summarize
    TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent),
    TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived),
    FlowCount = count(),
    UniqueDestinations = dcount(DestinationIP),
    Destinations = make_set(DestinationIP, 20),
    Ports = make_set(DestinationPort, 20)
    by SourceIP, bin(TimeGenerated, TimeWindow)
| extend TotalMBSent = TotalBytesSent / (1024 * 1024)
| where TotalMBSent >= DataTransferThresholdMB
| extend
    ClusterName = "AKS" // Would need to be enriched with actual cluster info
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    SourceIP,
    TotalMBSent,
    TotalBytesSent,
    FlowCount,
    UniqueDestinations,
    Destinations,
    Ports

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Detected {{TotalMBSent}} MB outbound transfer from {{SourceIP}} to {{UniqueDestinations}} unique destinations. This may indicate data exfiltration.
